Question.Subject: How to play online with a friend?
Question.Content: I want to find a good site that has the ability to play online with a friend (along with friend). I want the same as Windows Live Messenger, but in site. Please, do not want something that is paid or who has to install something on your computer.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
There's quite a few actually. Some of the most popular are listed below.
http://www.pogo.com (you and your friend just have to make free accounts)
http://www.miniclip.com/games/en/multiplayer.php

Answer.Content:
There's quite a few actually. Some of the most popular are listed below.
http://www.pogo.com (you and your friend just have to make free accounts)
http://www.miniclip.com/games/en/multiplayer.php
There is a FREE game called Yoville where you create a house and chat with friends
